GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.10.84
GSD.description:
ipv6: fix memory leak in fib6_rule_suppress

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.84 by commit 209d35ee34e25f9668c404350a1c86d914c54ffa, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit ca7a03c4175366a92cee0ccc4fec0038c3266e26. For more details please see the references link.
